cheatsheet.title: Proceed with Rest Of Cartridge Design

intro.description: This cheat sheet provides guidance about what needs to be done next, after the design pattern is applied and verified, and updates have been made to remove the build errors.

item.title: Create Fulfillment Functions
item.description: Click "Click to perform" in this cheat sheet to open the topic in Design Studio Help that provides information about creating fulfillment functions.

item.title: Create Fulfillment Systems
item.description: Click "Click to perform" in this cheat sheet to open the topic in Design Studio Help that provides information about creating fulfillment systems.

item.title: Create Decomposition Rules
item.description: Click "Click to perform" in this cheat sheet to open the topic in Design Studio Help that provides information about creating decomposition rules.

item.title: Create Fulfillment Patterns
item.description: Click "Click to perform" in this cheat sheet to open the topic in Design Studio Help that provides information about creating fulfillment patterns.

item.title: Create Composite Cartridge
item.description:
Create a new composite cartridge and add the other cartridges (except the Data Dictionary cartridge) to it in the Dependencies tab. Go into the cartridge editors for the other cartridges and in the Properties tab, de-select Standalone.
Click "Click to perform" in this cheat sheet to open the topic in Design Studio Help that provides information about creating composite cartridges.
